Event I went to Dr Subodh Gupta he examined and saw lung congestion and oxygen was 88 he gave me medicines and saved me

A few words for Dr Subodh Gupta! 
*************************************
Thank you so much for your kind and thoughtful concern in regard to my health and providing me with excellent medical and physical care. You controlled my diabetes from 367 to 110 in 10 days. It's a miracle for me. 
For diabetic patients:
No doubt Dr Subodh Gupta provides world class treatment to diabetic patients. Thus he is serving the Society in the best way. Diabetic patients should visit his clinic and enjoy their life comfortably in affordable budget. This is my experience.

Dr Subodh is highly professional. Listens very carefully and does a thorough examination. I am really impressed with the way he handled my case and gave his valuable advice.

Very sincere doctor of kind caring nature. Very open, is approachable and helpful to patients. Takes whatsapp / calls, messages from patients when in need, and responds soon. He does home visitations when needed and possible.  Excellent humane nature.
